snippet: Danny Welbeck scored his first international goal in the 36th minute Saturday to give England a 1-0 victory over Belgium at Wembley.
abstract: England gains a 1-0 victory over Belgium at Wembley and ensure that it enters Euro 2012 soccer tournament with a perfect record; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Danny Welbeck scored his first international goal in the 36th minute Saturday to give England a 1-0 victory over Belgium at Wembley.
